page.title: 12FARMING
page.content: dairy and sheep farm of 57 ha with 40 dairy cows plus 20 replacement heifers 100 sheep for lambs with two rams, 3 horses and a pony. Run by third generation owner. Much conservation measures including recent planting of 200 trees.{Highland Fm}37ha of pasture rented to Cadbury Barton on retirement of second generation owner. Buildings include poultry house for 2400 - 1 part-time employee.{Cadbury Barton Fm} 127 ha all with road frontage, run by D. Govier. Ewes are kept for fat lamb production. Cattle are bought as store and finished as beef.{Parsonage Fm}293 ha of pastures with beef cattle & sheep. The farm, varying in size has been in the family for generations. J.M. Crocombe runs the farm with 4 men {North Park Fm}34.4 ha, pastoral maint- aining 37 bullocks and 500 sheep. Run by the owner, A.J. Stanbury.{Sydham Fm
